about_the_game:
The Cartesian Project is a fast-paced first-person 3D platforming game that will pit you against an endless collection of procedurally generated challenges.

You control The Sentinel, a mysterious mechanical walker with unmatched agility and dexterity. You will infiltrate countless facilities and strongholds, stealing the resources you need to fuel your expeditions as you uncover your role in the conflicts surrounding the enigmatic planet of Eridani-C.

The Art of Movement

Mastering the precision handling of The Sentinel is crucial to success. Like threading a needle, you will need to maneuver to survive.

Assistance Required

Use visors and upgrades to fit your play style. See enemies through walls, glide through the air, or speed boost up a steep incline; The Sentinel is built to play to your strengths.

Caution Ahead

With hundreds of security system combinations, from rocket shooting robots to death lasers, you never know what to expect. Hone your ability to traverse these threats unscathed.


Feature List:
  • 3D Obstacle Arena
  • Procedurally Generated Maps
  • Share the Best Levels Online
  • Physics-Driven Gameplay
  • Competitive Multiplayer Modes
  • X-Box Controller Compatibility

The game is currently in the alpha stages of development but stay tuned to find out when and where you can get your hands on TCP!
